Articles.Content:
...Where no kerbal has gone before!

That thing was the hardest thing I ever landed... off center thrust, RSS Pol, but it survived! And I got a pretty picture I even got Bob to smile!

yes i know i forgot the deflector dish shutup...
The hardest ones to land always make you feel the best when you get it done. ^^
Should've used Kraken Drive, made it complete- I saw a K-Drive ship just like the one where the first human use of warp drive is done...

I could've, but I perfer to use Interstellar.

This was purely designed for a "picture" ship. Not designed to do anything, just to look good for a picture on my wall

I'll probably design another more "purposeful" ship.
